channel.title: [317] Add npc spawn (For newbies)
channel.description:
Hi and welcome to my first tut! :D (This "should" work on ALL sources :rolleyes:(if you not have any special sources))
So if you want to add a npc to your server? Go and open: Source Folder > Config > Autospawn.cfg or if it not there open: Source folder > Autospawn.cfg
There under your last code in autospawn.cfg add: [code]spawn = NPC ID 5000 4000 0 0 0 0 1 npcinfo[/code]
okay here it what it means: npcid = ID OF NPC Look in npc.cfg for npc code
5000 = XCoords where the npc is in th serve go to the place you want it and type: ::mypos and look for the XCoords
4000 = YCoords look upp for info
the zeros is if you want it to move add coords there IT IS X Y X Y
1 = Heigth you can leave that!
then save and run the server! Good luck post if any errors here: ;D

item.title: [317] Add npc spawn (For newbies)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:358601”]I have no idea what your talking about

[quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=455107.msg3332514#msg3332514 date=1283611273]
Not only is this not a proper tutorial, your information is wrong.

spawn = A B C D E F G [size=18pt]H[/size] I

A - NPC Id
B - X Coordinate
C - Y Coordinate
D - Height
E - Maximum X for walking
F - Maximum Y for walking
G - Minimum X for walking
[size=18pt]H[/size] - Minimum Y for walking
I - Walking type (1 allows it to walk, 0 doesn’t)
[/quote][/quote]correct me if i’m wrong, why the fuck would there be:
Maximum X
Maximum Y
Minimum X
and no Minimum Y?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Add npc spawn (For newbies)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Not only is this not a proper tutorial, your information is wrong.

spawn = [b]A[/b] [b]B[/b] [b]C[/b] [b]D[/b] [b]E[/b] [b]F[/b] [b]G[/b] [b]H[/b] [b]I[/b]

A - NPC Id
B - X Coordinate
C - Y Coordinate
D - Height
E - Maximum X for walking
F - Maximum Y for walking
G - Minimum X for walking
H - Minimum Y for walking
I - Walking type (1 allows it to walk, 0 doesn’t)

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Add npc spawn (For newbies)
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_lord zamorak lord
item.description:
@zamorak_lord wrote:

Hi and welcome to my first tut!
(This “should” work on ALL sources :rolleyes:(if you not have any special sources))

So if you want to add a npc to your server?
Go and open:
Source Folder > Config > Autospawn.cfg
or if it not there open:
Source folder > Autospawn.cfg

There under your last code in autospawn.cfg
add:

spawn = NPC ID        5000        4000        0        0       0         0       1     npcinfo

okay here it what it means:
npcid = ID OF NPC Look in npc.cfg for npc code

5000 = XCoords where the npc is in th serve go to the place you want it and type: ::mypos
and look for the XCoords

4000 = YCoords look upp for info

the zeros is if you want it to move add coords there IT IS X Y X Y

1 = Heigth you can leave that!

then save and run the server! Good luck post if any errors here: ;D

Read full topic
